portfolio.description_en: A soft, painterly depiction of a young lamb, focusing on the texture of wool and the brightness of an open field.
portfolio.description_zh: 通过柔和的笔触描绘了一只幼羊，重点表现了羊毛的质感以及开阔草地的明亮感。

portfolio.description_en: A vibrant character study using warm tones to give a typically fierce animal a friendly and approachable personality.
portfolio.description_zh: 使用暖色调进行的生动形象练习，赋予了原本凶猛的动物一种友好、亲切的性格。

portfolio.description_en: A detailed ink sketch of a dragon, showcasing intricate scale patterns and a dynamic, mythical silhouette.
portfolio.description_zh: 一幅细节丰富的巨龙墨线素描，展示了复杂的鳞片纹路和充满动感的神秘轮廓。

portfolio.description_en: A character expression sheet exploring six different emotional states through a stylized reimagining of a classic figure.
portfolio.description_zh: 一张角色表情练习图，通过对经典人物形象的风格化重塑，探索了六种不同的情绪状态。

portfolio.title_zh: 神探狗狗：幽灵抓捕行动
portfolio.description_en: An energetic fan art piece inspired by popular graphic novels, featuring dynamic movement and a playful composition.
portfolio.description_zh: 一幅受流行漫画启发的同人创作，体现了充满活力的动作设计和俏皮的画面构图。

portfolio.description_en: A full-body character design focusing on line work and the iconic accessories of the legendary hero.
portfolio.description_zh: 一幅全身角色设计图，专注于线条的表现力以及这位传奇英雄标志性的服饰配件。

portfolio.description_en: A creative crossover sketch blending the classic Garfield character with modern street-style elements.
portfolio.description_zh: 一张富有创意的跨界素描，将经典的加菲猫形象与现代街头风格元素相融合。

portfolio.description_en: A heartwarming holiday illustration featuring a curious cat in a gift box, emphasizing festive colors and storytelling.
portfolio.description_zh: 一幅温馨的节日插画，描绘了礼盒中一只好奇的小猫，强调了节日色彩和叙事感。

portfolio.description_en: A sophisticated character illustration incorporating traditional patterns and a cool color palette to evoke a sense of calm strength.
portfolio.description_zh: 一幅精细的角色插画，融合了传统纹样和冷色调，传达出一种冷静而强大的力量感。

portfolio.description_en: A creative use of watercolor to depict a mystical forest, showing an early interest in atmosphere and environment.
portfolio.description_zh: 创意性地运用水彩描绘神秘森林，展现了早期对氛围感和环境表现的兴趣。

portfolio.description_en: The starting point of the artistic journey—a vibrant, abstract world filled with childhood curiosity and unfiltered creativity.
portfolio.description_zh: 艺术旅程的起点——一个充满童心好奇与未经过滤的创造力的彩色抽象世界。

portfolio.description_en: An impressionistic take on nature, focusing on the harmony of vibrant colors and the rhythmic movement of brushstrokes.
portfolio.description_zh: 对大自然的印象派诠释，侧重于鲜艳色彩的和谐统一以及笔触的节奏感。

portfolio.description_en: A classic still life study focusing on the weight and volume of objects under a single light source.
portfolio.description_zh: 经典的静物练习，专注于单一光源下物体重量感与体积感的呈现。

portfolio.description_en: An exploration of architectural depth and three-dimensional space through precise line work.
portfolio.description_zh: 通过精准的线条勾勒，探索建筑深度与三维空间的表达。

portfolio.description_en: A rigorous academic study of light, shadow, and form. This sketch demonstrates fundamental skills in charcoal and the precision of anatomical observation.
portfolio.description_zh: 对光影和形态的严谨学术研究。这幅素描展示了炭笔运用的基本功以及对解剖结构的精准观察。

portfolio.description_en: A powerful exploration of identity using a bold red and black palette. This piece represents a shift from realistic observation to expressive storytelling.
portfolio.description_zh: 运用大胆的红黑配色对身份认同进行的深度探索。这幅作品标志着从写实观察向表现主义叙事的转变。

portfolio.description_en: A detailed portrait sketch focusing on human expression and the subtle textures of skin and hair.
portfolio.description_zh: 细腻的人物肖像素描，专注于表情刻画以及皮肤和发丝的微妙质感。

portfolio.description_en: An exercise in texture and materiality, capturing the subtle reflections and relationship between everyday objects.
portfolio.description_zh: 一次关于质感与材质的练习，捕捉了日常物品之间微妙的反光与空间关系。
